description:
Adobe Illustrator, the industry-standard vector graphics application, is the tool you use when you need flexible, scalable vector graphics such as logos and artwork that will be printed in various formats, mediums and sizes.

Illustrator is a powerful program, but it can be overwhelming or confusing at times, simply because of everything that is possible. If youâ€™re new to Illustrator, taking the time to understand the basics and how to use the specific tools will go a long way towards setting you up for success.

This Course is meant to make your life easier. It starts with the Interface , understanding Vector Art, applying various tools , effects, layers etc. Some cool tips have also been shared which will help you improve productivity and will give you an upper edge amongst your Peers.
title: Adobe Illustrator Step by Step for Beginners
